title: MS AccessAtn()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MS AccessAtn()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return the arc tangent of a number:
SELECT Atn(5) AS AtnNum;

Definition and Usage
The Atn() function returns the arc tangent of a number.
Syntax
Atn(
number
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
number
Required. A numeric value
Technical Details
Works in:
From Access 2000

❯
★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers MS AccessAtn()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MS AccessAtn()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MS AccessAtn()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
